About.paragraph: The aim of Little India Project is to give a platform to the exquisite and unique handicrafts of India. We Aim on retaining the authencity of products made by the very hands of the Indian artists and craftsmen. Not encouraging mass production and giving time to make each and every product to order and mostly, to Utmost perfection! We also aim on Making the artists and their brands visible to a wider range of Audience.
